title: So Malphites just going continue to exist in his current state
body:
Itemization is waaaaaay too good for him right now, he is just oppressive, lacks any real counterplay, deals too much damage for tank one shots ADC's with an iceborn and skull wand, if not forcing them to basically retreat on 15% hp.

Knock ups are innately broken for the same reason you removed all those silences riot, there is zero counterplay to a knock up, you cannot qss it, if you get hit you're basically fked, you can flash his ult but flash as a 500 second cd malphite ult has a 55 second cooldown (which is absolutely ridiculous) you do the maths.

Malphite needs hits to his cds and dmg mainly etc. etc. it's all good when he's a tank guy jumping in being disrupting as he's designed. it isn't ok when he is one shotting people HIMSELF with tank items.

You can check my last game full tank Malphite out dmg'd his mid lane Zed and his Ezreal. This isn't uncommon I usually get most damage on my team when I play Malphite.

replies.body: Why doesnt this have more attention? Malphite has been perma-banned in the past and Riot has not even mentioned him as far as I'm aware. And yes, I'm goddamn butthurt
